channel.title: +Wood on Vishvas's notes
channel.description: Recent content in +Wood on Vishvas's notes

item.title: Laminates
item.description: Constituents High-pressure decorative laminates (HPDLs) such as Formica or Wilsonart are generally comprised of layers of wood fibers, decorative paper (virgin and recycled), and (melamine) resin (a petrochemical product) glossy protective layer. Fabricating and installing can now be done with low-VOC adhesives. Brands Formica (= for mica) started off replacing mica in electrical insulation applications. Cost Formica FI 1146 WILDWEALD - 1600 for 4*8.

item.title: Particle boards
item.description: Negatives will expand when exposed to moisture. Glue used may emit harmful gases over lifetime. MDF board Properties Made by hot-pressing fiber (not sawdust) with resin. Isotropic (properties are the same in all directions as a result of no grain), so no tendency to split. Consistent in strength and size. Will deteriorate quickly if exposed to water and damp conditions. Dense and heavy. Common measurements 19mm (~.

item.title: Plywood
item.description: Health most plywood, emit harmful gases over time due to formaldehyde use. Best Choices zero emissions Green Club Plus 700 (GP). 25mm for doors: 2020 price online: 8634 + taxes. E1 standards use GreenPly Green (gold) brand blockboard/ plywood Birch plywood Doesn’t need laminate - naturally comes with good veneer. Birch plywood does not have jagged edges and knots. Safer, and edges look better.
